TopicTitle: make VAB zoom (middle mouse button) configurable

Articles.Content:
I think it's because they don't make 'm like they used to, but for whatever reason the middle/mousewheel button of my mice keep breaking. I looked hard in ksp controls configuration and in the settings.cfg but i can't find anything relating to the middle mouse button. So for now my solution is to program the mouse to have another button do what the middle mouse button does.

At any rate it would be convenient if all buttons used in the game are configurable.
